title: Beyond Bitcoin: Alki David’s DNA-Backed Coin Fuses Biotech, Streaming, and Celebrity in the Boldest Crypto Launch Yet
description: While mainstream crypto headlines this week focused on ETFs and SEC approvals, Alki David quietly detonated a cultural bomb in the blockchain world—with a token you can hold, scan, and clone (almost). The Alki David Coin isn’t just a currency—it’s a concept: a personalized, DNA-backed, real-world asset token that combines biotech, media, and market access […]The post Beyond Bitcoin: Alki David’s DNA-Backed Coin Fuses Biotech, Streaming, and Celebrity in the Boldest Crypto Launch Yet appeared first on .
